com.mvohm.quadruple.test

Class QuadTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mvohm.quadruple.test.QuadTest

  • public class QuadTest
extends Object
    A stand-alone program for testing methods of the Quadruple class.

    Creates a set of testers, one for each of the operations of the Quadruple class that need to be tested. Each tester is an instance of a specific concrete descendant of abstract class TesterClasses.QuadTester and is intended to test respective operation of Quadruple, such as Quadruple.add(Quadruple) or Quadruple.sqrt(). Concrete tester classes are defined in the SpecificTesterClasses class.

    The main(String...) method parses the command-line arguments and sets the execution mode accordingly, then iterates through the testers and calls their TesterClasses.QuadTester.test() methods, which return instances of the TestResults class containing information about the results of the test, such as the number of errors, mean error, maximum error, MSE, etc.

    These instances are then passed to the TestResults.register(TestResults) method of another instance of the TestResults, that accumulates the summary results for all performed tests. After finishing the tests, the summary statistics is printed to the console as following:

    Results of summary of 20 tests
on 70209 samples with err threshold 1.470e-39
  MSE        =  1.450e-79
  sqrt(MSE)  =  3.807e-40
  mean error =  3.592e-42
  Max error  =  1.469e-39
-------------------------
  Err %      =      0 (0.00%)
  Hex diff   =      0 (0.00%)
  Src errors =      0
    Usage: 
      java QuadTest [-v:verbosity] [-r:randCount]
  verbosity: 0 -- silent (no output except the summary),
             1 -- medium (default, outputs the results of specific tests),
             2 -- talkative (outputs data and errors for each data sample).
  randCount: 0 -- do not include random numbers in the test data,
             n -- generate n random samples for each test, default value is 3000
    Author:
    M.Vokhmentsev

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String... args)
        Performs the tests.
        Parses the command line arguments and accordingly sets the execution mode, then iterates through the testers contained in a statically defined testers array and calls their TesterClasses.QuadTester.test() methods. The results and statistics for individual tests are accumulated in a TestResults instance and displayed to the console after all tests have completed.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
